categories: Category:Starships of the Order of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: A starship was owned by the Muun Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Plagueis in the years before his death in 32 BBY. He flew it with his personal droid 11-4D and used it for missions to places such as Abraxin and Naboo on missions to find Naat Lare and to kill Ars Veruna respectively.
It is unknown what happened to the vessel after Plagueis' demise.
